2.1. Proxyì˜ return ê°’

So, return Reflect... provides a safe no-brainer to forward the operation and make sure we donâ€™t forget anything related to that. [Ilya kantor, ëª¨ë˜ JavaScript íŠœí† ë¦¬ì–¼ ì €ì]
